pr_title: CB-9528: Datalake DR: Database backup restore operations are failing in CB2.32.

timeline.message: CB-9528: Datalake DR: Database backup restore operations are failing in CB2.32

timeline.bodyText: Why are we passing both backupId and restoreId to the restore operation calls? I don't see where we're actually using backupId, although I may just be missing it.
timeline.author: hreeve-cloudera

replies.bodyText:
we need backup-id to use the exact backup location for database backup. This was there from before.
We need restore-id to poll the status of datalake-dr operation for the restore to end the flow.
replies.author: kkalvagadda1

timeline.bodyText: If this method is databasebackupFailed, we can leave the log message the same as it was before, since it is about the failed database backup.
